verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto him out of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H120>them<s%>, If anyone of you <S%H7126>brings<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> your <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, even of the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, and of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

If his <S%H7133>offering<s%> is a burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, let him <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>: he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it of his own voluntary <S%H7522>will<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>; and it shall be <S%H7521>accepted<s%> for him to make atonement for <S%H3722>him<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H1121>bullock<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.
And he shall <S%H6584>flay<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into his <S%H5409>pieces<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and lay the <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon the <S%H784>fire<s%>:

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, shall <S%H6186>lay<s%> the <S%H5409>parts<s%>, the <S%H7218>head<s%>, and the <S%H6309>fat<s%>, in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

But his <S%H7130>innards<s%> and his <S%H3767>legs<s%> shall he <S%H7364>wash<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> all on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, to be a burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And if his <S%H7133>offering<s%> be of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, <S%H3775>namely<s%>, of the sheep, or of the <S%H5795>goats<s%>, for a burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>; he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it a <S%H2145>male<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5408>cut<s%> it into his <S%H5409>pieces<s%>, with his <S%H7218>head<s%> and his <S%H6309>fat<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall lay them in <S%H6186>order<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%> which is upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

But he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> the <S%H7130>innards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%>: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it <S%H6999>all<s%>, and burn it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is a burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And if the burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be of <S%H5775>birds<s%>, then he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> of <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%>, or of <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> it unto the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and wring <S%H4454>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>; and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> there shall be wrung <S%H4680>out<s%> at the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>:

And he shall pluck <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H4760>crop<s%> with his <S%H5133>feathers<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the east <S%H6924>part<s%>, by the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H1880>ashes<s%>:

And he shall <S%H8156>cleave<s%> it with the <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H914>there<s%>, but shall not divide it asunder: and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, upon the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is upon the <S%H784>fire<s%>: it is a burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
